info.title: hp-public-dev-api-server
info.description: NestJS CQRS + TDD base for Humanity Public Dev API

Recordstringunknown.description: Construct a type with a set of properties K of type T

oneOf.description: Insufficient scope for the requested preset data; see Appendix J Error Codes (E4003) and Appendix O Advanced Consent Management (revoked scopes).
Preset is unavailable because verification is pending, revoked, or incomplete; documented in Appendix J Error Codes (E4004) and Appendix D Developer Flows.
Cached preset data has expired and requires reauthorization; described in Appendix B API Reference preset expiration response.
OAuth access token is expired; covered in Appendix J Error Codes (E4041 Token Expired).
OAuth access token is invalid due to revocation, mismatch, or signature issues; detailed in Appendix J Error Codes (E4042 Invalid Token).
Requested preset resource cannot be found; specified in Appendix J Error Codes (E4044 Not Found).

Recordstringstringnumberbooleanstringnul.description: Construct a type with a set of properties K of type T

PresetInfo.description: Full preset info including scope and category.

tags.name: OAuth & Consent
tags.description: OAuth 2.0 authorization endpoints including PKCE flow, token exchange, consent management, and token revocation.

tags.name: Presets
tags.description: Verification presets for identity attributes like age verification, humanity verification, and investor status.

tags.name: User Info
tags.description: User information and profile endpoints for retrieving authenticated user data.

tags.name: Status & Credentials
tags.description: Endpoints for checking credential status and authorization updates.

tags.name: Discovery
tags.description: OpenID Connect and Humanity Protocol discovery endpoints including JWKS and configuration.

tags.name: Auth
tags.description: Authentication endpoints for session management and logout.

tags.name: Access Control
tags.description: Access request and developer access management endpoints.

tags.name: Health
tags.description: Health check and readiness probe endpoints for monitoring.

tags.name: Examples
tags.description: Example endpoints for testing and demonstration purposes.
